{"id":499527214,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1622224277,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/499527214/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace All ?'s to Avoid Consecutive Repeating Characters","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string modifyString(string s) {\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i) {\n            if (s[i] != '?') continue;\n            for (int j=0; j<26; ++j) {\n                char c = j + 'a';\n                if ((i > 0 && s[i-1] == c) || (i < s.size()-1 && s[i + 1] == c))\n                    continue;\n                s[i] = c;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-all-s-to-avoid-consecutive-repeating-characters"}
